Package oshi.demo

Class WmiNoComInitQueryHandler

java.lang.Object
oshi.util.platform.windows.WmiQueryHandler
oshi.demo.WmiNoComInitQueryHandler
public class WmiNoComInitQueryHandler extends oshi.util.platform.windows.WmiQueryHandler
Query handler class that avoids COM initialization overhead assuming COM is already initialized by the user.

  • Method Details

    • initCOM

      public boolean initCOM()
      Don't initialize COM, despite the method name. Overrides the superclass WmiQueryHandler.initCOM() method to bypass COM initialization.
